## Public Member Functions

### isTargetMemoryOpcode() {#abbe99ba87bfa5a46bd9a08d840f7ef26}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool RISCVSelectionDAGInfo::isTargetMemoryOpcode (unsigned Opcode) const"
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Returns true if a node with the given target-specific opcode has a memory operand.

Nodes with such opcodes can only be created with <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag/#ae6cc63109335eefe2c5727d1e12fc820">SelectionDAG::getMemIntrinsicNode</a></code>.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/riscvselectiondaginfo-h/#l00020">20</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/riscvselectiondaginfo-h">RISCVSelectionDAGInfo.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/riscvselectiondaginfo-cpp/#l00016">16</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/riscvselectiondaginfo-cpp">RISCVSelectionDAGInfo.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### isTargetStrictFPOpcode() {#aef709cd913ba5be747baec690569430e}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool RISCVSelectionDAGInfo::isTargetStrictFPOpcode (unsigned Opcode) const"
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Returns true if a node with the given target-specific opcode has strict floating-point semantics.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/riscvselectiondaginfo-h/#l00022">22</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/riscvselectiondaginfo-h">RISCVSelectionDAGInfo.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/riscvselectiondaginfo-cpp/#l00021">21</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/riscvselectiondaginfo-cpp">RISCVSelectionDAGInfo.cpp</a>.
